Richmond captain Trent Cotchin and his wife Brooke (pictured left) and newly separated Damien Hardwick and his wife Danielle (pictured right). (Getty Images)

articles.title: Tributes flow for ‘unsung hero’ after losing cancer battle - Herald Sun
